title: 帮我去外网下载几个东西
author: lishanglin
txt_content:
RT，我的网络太渣，下载不了
去这几个网址帮我下载几套自定义笔刷，上传到百度云
http://www.planetminecraft.com/p ... es---by-tylertimoj/

http://www.planetminecraft.com/p ... es-pack-by-fandyus/

http://www.planetminecraft.com/p ... ter-brushes-i-made/
链接直接回复就行

replies.author: 何劲飞啊
replies.txt_content: 链接: http://pan.baidu.com/s/1kVNNK4v 密码: hpa6

replies.author: 地上的灰尘
replies.txt_content: 你也顺便帮我提完了，感谢分享233
